testCase.title: Complete operations within the 'Payments' page
steps: Create or record a new payment
testCase.successCriteria: All CRUD operations function correctly; updates reflect immediately on the interface and database; validation, authorization, and error handling work as expected.

notes:
creating new record for payment button is not working, not clickable, delete function is not working

suggestion: try to put drop down in updating dates, and changing the payment method so it will have consistency
